column4: I am having problems installing the NVIDIA drivers for a Geforce 8800GTS, xorg crashes every time they are enalbed
send me your video card and i will figure it out
did you try looking in the ubuntu forums? I would wait around in here and ask every now ant then someones sure to come around thats been there before

check out this thread, i did not read the whole thing, but judging from the name of the thread and by the page the link carries you to, someone may have figured it out. look at at post #54   http://ubuntuforums.org/showthread.php?t=413961&page=6
